title: Drawing, Abby Aldrich Greene Rockefeller Apartment: Dressing Room Furniture Placement, 1929–32
title_raw: Abby Aldrich Greene Rockefeller Apartment: Dressing Room Furniture Placement
medium: Graphite and black ink on tracing paper
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/145 WEST 57TH STREET/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower center: FURNITURE PLACEMENT FOR DRESSING ROOM/10 WEST 54TH ST/MRS ROCKEFELLER DRESSING R.M.; inscribed in graphite with materials and instructions; inscribed in graphite at lower right: #460
description: Entrances to room at lower left and right corners. Chest with rounded front edges between doors at lower wall. Small cabinet with rounded front on lower left wall and upper left wall. Long, narrow day bed at center of left wall; clear glass and crystal telephone table to right of day bed. Circular table in green sharkskin and crystal in front of day bed. Vanity at center of far wall with rounded front corners; swivel armchair with circular seat at vanity. Large upholstered armchair in upper right corner.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Abby Aldrich Greene Rockefeller Apartment: Dressing Room Furniture Placement, 1929–32. Graphite and black ink on tracing paper. 
Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-463
